Text:
sorry guys but this release is broken.

-cut of top and bottom parts
-stretched
-very blurry

I would recommend this release instead:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7043166/Transformers.Prime.S02E01.Orion.Pax.Part.1.HDTV.XviD-NMBSTV
Just for the record, there's nothing cut off, just the black 16:9 bars have been removed to make the image full frame on a wide screen. And the image is not *that* bad either. But hey.
